about_the_game:
As trusted ambassador of the House of the Owl Tide, our hogbunny friend Gnart Tigermoth is on a mission to represent the Owl Tide at a ceremony in the seashell city of Konkylia. A new High Priestess is to be chosen, but there is trouble brewing, and soon Gnart and his mystical friend Olia find themselves in the middle of family issues and treasonous conspiracy.

Available in English only. The comic book can be accessed by selecting the title menu option, "Comic Book" after the installation is complete.
detailed_description:
As trusted ambassador of the House of the Owl Tide, our hogbunny friend Gnart Tigermoth is on a mission to represent the Owl Tide at a ceremony in the seashell city of Konkylia. A new High Priestess is to be chosen, but there is trouble brewing, and soon Gnart and his mystical friend Olia find themselves in the middle of family issues and treasonous conspiracy.

Available in English only. The comic book can be accessed by selecting the title menu option, "Comic Book" after the installation is complete.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ GPU with 1GB of memory
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Quad Core 3.4GHz or greater
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ GPU with 2GB of memory
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
